words.question: Ravage
words.hint: Fears that a war could ravage their country

words.question: Ostracize
option: Exclude from a society or group.
words.hint: A group of people were ostracized, and persecuted for centuries

words.question: Ravenous
words.hint: I'd been out all day and was ravenous

words.question: Subdue
words.hint: He managed to subdue an instinct to applaud

words.question: Spry
words.hint: He continued to look spry into his eighties

words.question: Protege
option: A person who is guided and supported by experienced person
words.hint: Lake, a Trump protege, accuses elections officials of slow-rolling returns

words.question: Precipitate
words.hint: The incident precipitated a political crisis

words.question: Caseous
words.hint: Surgical intervention was performed to excise the caseous lesions

words.question: Acrophobia
words.hint: Because I have acrophobia, I never ride anything other than the Ferris wheel at the amusement park
